select sku.sku_id from gmall_activity.activity_info info inner join gmall_activity.activity_sku sku on info.id = sku.activity_id
and sku.sku_id in
#{item}
and now() between info.start_time and info.end_time

select info.activity_type, rule.id, rule.activity_id, rule.condition_amount, rule.condition_num, rule.benefit_amount, rule.benefit_discount, rule.benefit_level from activity_info info inner join activity_rule rule on info.id=rule.activity_id inner join activity_sku sku on info.id=sku.activity_id where sku.sku_id = #{skuId} and now() between info.start_time and info.end_time order by rule.condition_amount desc ,rule.condition_num desc;

select info.activity_type as activityType, rule.id,rule.activity_id, rule.condition_amount, rule.condition_num, rule.benefit_amount, rule.benefit_discount, rule.benefit_level, sku.sku_id as skuId from activity_info info inner join activity_rule rule on info.id = rule.activity_id inner join activity_sku sku on info.id = sku.activity_id
and sku.sku_id in
#{item}
and now() between info.start_time and info.end_time
order by rule.condition_amount desc, rule.condition_num desc
